languages.text: "Это точно не помешает. Я тоже послежу. Эх, понять бы, что значит... Может, опасность для нее... а может — от нее исходящую".

languages.text: “盯着她肯定没什么坏处，我也会盯着她。唉，要是我知道这些话是什么意思就好了……或许她会遇到危险……也或许她会带来危险……”
languages.original_text: "It certainly wouldn't hurt. I'll keep a watch on her too. Ugh, if only I knew what it meant... Maybe it means danger for her... or maybe danger coming from her..."

traits.locale_text: “盯着她肯定没什么坏处，我也会盯着她。唉，要是我知道这些话是什么意思就好了……或许她会遇到危险……也或许她会带来危险……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "It certainly wouldn't hurt. I'll keep a watch on her too. Ugh, if only I knew what it meant... Maybe it means danger for her... or maybe danger coming from her..."

languages.text: «No sería mala idea. Yo también tendré un ojo puesto en ella. Ugh, si supiera lo que significa... Tal vez sea que ella está en peligro... o que ella será un peligro...».
languages.original_text: "It certainly wouldn't hurt. I'll keep a watch on her too. Ugh, if only I knew what it meant... Maybe it means danger for her... or maybe danger coming from her..."

traits.locale_text: «No sería mala idea. Yo también tendré un ojo puesto en ella. Ugh, si supiera lo que significa... Tal vez sea que ella está en peligro... o que ella será un peligro...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「確かに損はないでしょうね。あたいも彼女を見張っておくわ。ああ、それが何を意味していたのかさえ分かれば…もしかしたら、彼女にとっての危険を意味しているのかもしれないし…あるいは、彼女が危険を起こすのかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "It certainly wouldn't hurt. I'll keep a watch on her too. Ugh, if only I knew what it meant... Maybe it means danger for her... or maybe danger coming from her..."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに損はないでしょうね。あたいも彼女を見張っておくわ。ああ、それが何を意味していたのかさえ分かれば…もしかしたら、彼女にとっての危険を意味しているのかもしれないし…あるいは、彼女が危険を起こすのかもしれない」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Es würde gewiss nicht schaden. Ich werde sie auch im Auge behalten. Uff, wenn ich doch nur wüsste, was es bedeutet ... Vielleicht bedeutet es, dass sie in Gefahr ist ... oder dass von ihr Gefahr ausgeht ..."
languages.original_text: "It certainly wouldn't hurt. I'll keep a watch on her too. Ugh, if only I knew what it meant... Maybe it means danger for her... or maybe danger coming from her..."

traits.locale_text: "Es würde gewiss nicht schaden. Ich werde sie auch im Auge behalten. Uff, wenn ich doch nur wüsste, was es bedeutet ... Vielleicht bedeutet es, dass sie in Gefahr ist ... oder dass von ihr Gefahr ausgeht ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ça ne peut pas faire de mal. Moi aussi, je vais la surveiller de près. Pfff, si seulement je savais ce que ça veut dire... Peut-être qu'elle est en danger... ou peut-être que le danger, c'est elle... »
languages.original_text: "It certainly wouldn't hurt. I'll keep a watch on her too. Ugh, if only I knew what it meant... Maybe it means danger for her... or maybe danger coming from her..."

traits.locale_text: « Ça ne peut pas faire de mal. Moi aussi, je vais la surveiller de près. Pfff, si seulement je savais ce que ça veut dire... Peut-être qu'elle est en danger... ou peut-être que le danger, c'est elle... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Fena olmaz. Benim de gözüm üstünde olacak. Duyduklarımı bir anlamlandırabilsem. Belki tehlikededir... Belki de tehlikenin ta kendisidir."
languages.original_text: "It certainly wouldn't hurt. I'll keep a watch on her too. Ugh, if only I knew what it meant... Maybe it means danger for her... or maybe danger coming from her..."

traits.locale_text: "Zararı dokunacağını sanmıyorum. Benim de gözüm üzerinde olacak. Öf, keşke tüm bunların anlamını çözebilseydim. Belki o tehdit altındadır... Belki de biz onun tehdidi altındayızdır..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
